vote.title: Appointment of Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee (Pope McDowell) (Sup Res 010-21/22)
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the appointment of Ms. Jennifer Pope McDowell, representing the Los Angeles Mayor’s Office, as a Member to the School Construction Bond Citizens’ Oversight Committee for a two-year term commencing immediately. The Board has determined that Ms. Pope McDowell is not an employee, official, vendor, contractor, or consultant of the District.
